ResearchProjectDef.label: Auger drill I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make buildings that can extract random minerals and rocks from deep underground.(can cause infestation)
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
You have now Researched Auger drill I with this you have unlocked tier 1 auto miner.
 This miner will mine up random items over time, it can start infestation like vanilla drills.

 Tier 2 miner is same type of miner its just faster and will mine steel instead of slag.

 Tier3 have 2 types of miners. 1. is a random miner like 2 previous, it will mine random rare ores up (no stone chunks)
 type 2. is a new type of miner where you can set exactly what type of ore you want, it will mine mainly that one, but will have a chance to mine junk and rare ores too. 

 if you want unbalanced mode for miner and ALL ores unlocked go to modsettings and turn it on.
